Text: What is this place?
First, I need to summon the element of Light.

Glad to see you arrived 
 safe and sound. Welcome 
 to the plane where Light 
 and Darkness reside.
What's going on? \n What are you doing here?
I'm a Creator, and a \n guardian of the gateway \n between worlds.
What we need to \n set everything straight \n again is in here.
Now listen carefully, \n because this won't \n be easy.

You'll need to wake the 
 Light and Darkness and 
 force them to manifest 
 in physical form.
Start with calling \n forth the element \n of Light.
To do so, \n protect the \n light Nevi...
And defeat the \n dark Nevi.

When you do, 
 you'll convert 
 the areas they 
 hold to the light.

Once you've converted 
 everything, the element 
 of Light should manifest 
 in physical form.
So... \n Take down all \n of the dark Nevi?
Well, if you want \n to make things \n simple. Yes.
You could've just \n told me that.
It won't be easy.
But you're the \n only one who \n can do it.

I'm not sure why, but 
 you seem to be at the 
 center of everything 
 going wrong.
Hahaha!

It has been so long 
 since I took this form, 
 I barely remember 
 what it's like.
Who are you to \n summon the \n element of Light?
And how could a human \n enter this plane?

Am I to assume those 
 so-called Creators are 
 using you to do their 
 dirty work?
I'm here for my own \n reasons.

I need to get you 
 back in the Ark to 
 power it up and 
 fix things.
Hah! \n You think you can \n control me?
Then prove yourself!
This should be fun.
What's happening \n to him?
Hahaha! \n The power burns \n through me.
Nothing can \n stand up to the \n Light!
Cyanea, you're \n here too?
Deep within the \n Creator Cyanea sleeps \n a powerful force.
Where there is light, \n there is darkness.
Protect the dark \n Nevi...
And defeat the \n light Nevi.

Dark good, light bad. 
 Got it - just do the 
 opposite of what I 
 did before.
*Sigh*
I thought I sensed \n the stench of one \n of your kind...
Smell, sight, taste, \n touch - I hate having \n to take this form.

You would dare 
 call forth Tenebria, 
 the element of 
 Darkness?
I'll give you one \n chance. Leave now, \n and I'll let you live.
I'm not going anywhere, \n I'm here to claim your \n power!

Then it's time to show 
 you what happens to 
 insolent fools who 
 stumble into the dark.
Ah, the Darkness \n flows through me...

The element of 
 Light likes to 
 take the direct 
 approach.

But it's much 
 harder to fight 
 what you can't 
 see.
You reek of the \n emotions you hold.
Love, nobility, pah - \n such worthless concepts.

We'll see how 
 worthless they 
 are when I take 
 you out!
I wish there was \n time to celebrate \n your victory...
But you're going to \n need to get out of here. \n Quick.

Without the elements of 
 Light and Darkness, the 
 threads binding this 
 world are unravelling.

We'll try to hold this 
 place together as long 
 as we can, but it's 
 collapsing.
I get the picture. It's \n time to go.
And go fast.
The exit is just ahead.
There's no time to waste.
Defeat the Dark Nevi to \n Summon the Light
So I need to take down all of those dark Nevi.
No!
It's working.
I think we're going to pull this off.
We're doing good.
Just one more to go.
That's the last one!
They stole one of the areas!
I lost an area, but I should be fine.
Lost an area, but I'm still okay.
They took an area from me, but I should be safe.
They grabbed an area.
Guess the light Nevi are going to hang back on guard duty.
I can't take the area if there are any dark Nevi around.
I just have to take down the dark Nevi to claim their area.
I better move fast before the light Nevi get taken down.
Gade: \n The light is fading, you have to fight back!
Gade: \n Protect the light from the dark Nevi.
Gade: \n The dark Nevi are coming to steal the light.
Gade: \n More dark Nevi are coming.
Gade: \n Watch out, more of those dark Nevi have appeared.
Gade: \n Careful not to lose what you've got to the dark Nevi.
Gade: \n The light is gone... The dark Nevi have taken everything.
Gade: \n Well done on winning the area over for the light!
Gade: \n The element of Light... It's waking!
Gade: \n Just one to go!
Gade: \n That's another victory for the light.
Gade: \n Keep it up!
Gade: \n The dark Nevi have stolen some of the light.
I have to get back to the fight.
Defeat Lumino
I can't leave without the element of Light.
Gade: \n He's absorbing the light!
Gade: \n Stop him by taking out those light Nevi!
Gade: \n You can't let him finish absorbing the light.
Gade: \n With the power of the light, he's more powerful than ever.
Gade: \n Watch it, he's very powerful now!
Gade: \n He's more dangerous than ever.
Gade: \n Well done, that stopped him from powering up.
Gade: \n You've put a halt to his plans of powering up.
Gade: \n He doesn't have any light left to absorb now.
Gade: \n He's back to normal, time to go on the attack!
Gade: \n Looks like he's powered down.
Gade: \n Now's your chance to attack him again.
Gade: \n Take him down and claim the element of Light.
Gade: \n Uh oh, another area just lit up.
Gade: \n There's an area producing light.
Gade: \n Take out the light Nevi to turn out that light!
Gade: \n He's making a move to absorb the light.
Gade: \n Take down the light Nevi and turn that area dark again.
Lumino: \n Who knew humans made for such good sport?
Lumino: \n Thank you for keeping this interesting.
Lumino: \n Now let's have some more fun!
I can't leave the fight!
What's happening?
Lumino: \n Now to show you the true power of the light!
Gade: \n Well done! That takes care of the element of Light.
Defeat the Light Nevi to \n Summon the Darkness
This time it's the dark Nevi on my side...
I failed...
That's the way.
I think we're going to pull this off.
We're doing good.
It's just a matter of time now.
Things are going my way.
They stole away one of the areas!
I lost an area, but I should be fine.
Lost an area, but I'm still okay.
They took an area from me, but I should be safe.
They grabbed an area.
So this time the dark Nevi are on guard duty for me...
I can't take the area if there are any light Nevi around.
I better take down the light Nevi before they overwhelm us.
I need to take down the light Nevi to expand the darkness.
Cyanea: \n The darkness is slipping away.
Cyanea: \n You must protect the darkness.
Cyanea: \n Light Nevi are coming to smother the darkness.
Cyanea: \n More light Nevi have appeared.
Cyanea: \n The light Nevi are on the attack.
Cyanea: \n The light Nevi are heading for the darkness.
Cyanea: \n The darkness has been swallowed by the light.
Cyanea: \n The darkness is complete.
Cyanea: \n The element of Darkness is coming.
Cyanea: \n One last corner of light left.
Cyanea: \n The light is gone.
Cyanea: \n You've almost done it.
Cyanea: \n The light has taken over.
Defeat Tenebria
I can't leave without the element of Darkness.
Cyanea: \n She's absorbing the darkness.
Cyanea: \n You must take out the dark Nevi to cut off her power.
Cyanea: \n You can't let her absorb all of that darkness.
Cyanea: \n With that much darkness, she's more powerful than ever.
Cyanea: \n Be careful, she's stronger now.
Cyanea: \n Keep your guard up, she's going to go on the attack.
Cyanea: \n You managed to prevent her from absorbing the darkness.
Cyanea: \n You stopped her from absorbing the darkness.
Cyanea: \n She won't be able to absorb any more power now.
Cyanea: \n She's back to normal.
Cyanea: \n She used up all of that power she absorbed.
Cyanea: \n Now's your chance to fight back.
Cyanea: \n Take her out to get the element of Darkness you need.
Tenebria: \n Ugh... You humans are so vile.
Tenebria: \n You would dare to attack me?
Tenebria: \n Wretched thing, why don't you just give up?
I can't leave the fight!
Cyanea: \n Another area just went dark.
Cyanea: \n You can't let her reach the darkness.
Cyanea: \n Defeat the dark Nevi and cut off her access to the darkness.
Cyanea: \n You can't let her absorb the darkness from those Nevi.
Cyanea: \n Remove the dark Nevi to return light to the darkness.
Cyanea: \n You've handled the element of Darkness, but there's a problem.
Escape
I have to get out of here!
Agh!
I need to get out of here!
It's not safe for me to move through here.
Gade: \n Follow the path of the light.
Cyanea: \n Seek safety in darkness.
Cyanea: \n Hurry, this plane is collapsing.
Time to Destruction
Gade: \n Come on, just a little further!
Gade: \n There's your ticket out of here!
Gade: \n Almost there!
